entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 4:50 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with snow and ice pellets changing to rain this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
